sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When the character wields a Lightsaber weapon, Melee weapon, or Brawl weapon, that weapon gains ranks in the Defensive item quality equal to the character's ranks in Defensive Training (this replaces any ranks in Defensive the weapon already has).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <name>Defensive training</name> <number>TAL0001029</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 22:10:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>98229f60dbea0c542901de90cf961913</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 22:10:41</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
